article_title: Iredell Board of Commissioners candidate T.J. Johnson campaigns on conservatism
article_text: Haven’t signed up for All Access yet? Get started here…

og.description: T.J. Johnson had never considered making a run for public office until his wife, Jennifer, gave birth to their first child 20 months ago.
